description:
Naruto, the massive anime and manga franchise, is set to reach an all-new medium. The brand first debuted in 1999, and now more than two decades later, Naruto is set to be reimagined as a live-action movie from Lionsgate. This is certainly an exciting development for fans of the franchise. Especially as live-action adaptations of [...]

The post Live-Action ‘Naruto’ Movie In The Works At Lionsgate appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Live-Action ‘Naruto’ Movie In The Works At Lionsgate

description:
Actor Doug Bradley once led eight installments of the Hellraiser movie franchise as the iconic villain known as Pinhead. The films made since have attempted to recast him with each new iteration. Now, however, Doug Bradley clarifies he’d return as Pinhead for an adaptation of Clive Barker’s The Scarlet Gospels. The Hellraiser brand first started [...]

The post Doug Bradley Interested In Returning As “Older Darker” Pinhead appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Doug Bradley Interested In Returning As “Older Darker” Pinhead
